<!-- Do not edit this file. It is generated automatically -->

## consume() function

消费给定数量的 Iterable/AsyncIterable。如果数字为空,则消费全部。

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function consume<
  A extends Iterable<unknown> | AsyncIterable<unknown>,
  B extends number,
>(iterator: A, n?: B): ReturnValueType<A, void>;
```

## Example

```ts
const iterator = (function* () {
  yield 1;
  yield 2;
  yield 3;
})();
consume(iterator, 2);
iterator.next(); // {value:3, done:false}
iterator.next(); // {value:undefined, done:true}

// with pipe
pipe(range(10), peek(updateApi), concurrent(5), consume);
```

[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/consume.ts)
